Despite of the points of criticism that will follow in that review, I have had many hours of fun in this game.
But that basically is the case, because I played with friends most of the time.
Of course, you're going to have fun when you sit in Teamspeak with friends, being afraid to get killed.
People will shout, laugh their asses of and just enjoy the time.
Playing alone, with only strangers, though, is nearly always a pure disappointment.
And even with friends, there were some things that have continuously sabotaged the overall experience with Dead by Daylight.

Let's talk about bugs/problems now, that come along with the software.

[b]Lobby problems[/b]

Regardless of whether you queue up with friends or just solo, you will often get kicked out of lobby.
So after join a queue, joining a lobby then, you will often just find yourself in the main lobby again for no obvious reason.
I have checked the boards already and this problem seems to be there for a serious amount of time already and it is annoying.
I have to add, that I could easily deal with it, when only 1 of 10 games would be affected by this, me in solo games, and me when playing with friends (and also them) experienced it in nearly every round.
So for playing one round, you have to rejoin queue several times.
When playing with friends, you also have to reinvite them, before attempt playing a game once again.

[b]Loading screen problems[/b]

And if you managed to reach the loading screen of the game, it does actually appear in some games (respectively loading screens), that people won't load the game properly for unknown reasons. Therefore, you will sit in the loading screen, waiting few minutes, until the game starts. At that moment your best situation possible will be a game with 3 survivors and 4 generators to go for, BUT in many situations like that, other players, besides the one affected, will also leave, because they're just as stuck in the loading screen. And since it can take 5 minutes or even more, until you'll enter the game in a situation like that, people will simply leave.
You will always face a worse situation then ingame, after waiting a really long time.

[b]Leaving killers (early)[/b]

Another problematic topic are leaving killers.
When the killer leaves the game, you will get 5000 Bloodpoints.
Often, killers leave at the moment the loading screen has not finished.
In those cases, you have waited some time and then get awarded 5000 Bloodpoints, but none else.
You will then loose a pip of your rank and often you will lose your item, your offering, or both.
And if that appears in a long-lasting loading screen, you will wait few minutes to lose a rank pip and items.
What a joy, I can tell...

[b]Balance of awarded Bloodpoints (Survivor)[/b]

One thing you can't really let go unchallenged, is the system behind awareded Bloodpoints for survivors.
Repairing generators, or being chased by the killers, is simply awarded too little.
You will be awarded much more for unhooking other survivors, regardless of the use for the team in the specific situation.
I had games in which the killer chased me more than two minutes, then I died and got very little points.
So I gave the opportunity to my teammates, to win the game straight away, but have been awarded hilariously low amounts of Bloodpoints in relation.
According to the generators, one key part is the fact that you won't win games without repaired generators.
You can, of course, win games with people hanging on hooks.
But you see people cleansing 1 totem, then unhook players in the basement and just die (all two of them) but because they kept unhooking each other, they end up having a solid amount of points at the end, while you have repaired 3 generators and it doesn't pay off at all, although it was possibly the best for you to do, since your teammates just suicided.
And the fourth player eventually would just escape through the hatch afterwards, although he did 0.
I'm not saying it is complete trash, but it simply needs some adjustment.

[u]Ingame bugs[/u]

There are a few ingame bugs too, that appear every now and then and can be quite frustrating, as it cost you the win e.g.
One of the big bugs, that I have witnessed more frequently lately, is the chest bug.
You would stand in front of a chest, which you have opened before and you want to pick up the item inside.
Visually, it will just hover above the chest and it is not possible to pick it up, for unknown reasons.
Another problem according the chests, is the fact that if you want to swap items, you sometimes have to walk few steps away and then walk back again, before it becomes possible to pick the item in the chest.
This costs crucial time and doesn't seem to make any sense either.

A third thing that can be hilarious, but also frustrating, is a bug, where the survivors hand is being bend in weird ways.
When hold a flashlight, for example, it would not point forward, but sideways, for example.
Basically that means, that you simply cannot use it properly anymore.

One last thing that I have experienced a few times yet, is this: You would get unhooked by another survivor, but the entity animation would just continue and after a while you would just die (and also sometimes drop into the ground or something) for no obvious reason.

[u]Summary[/u]

Dead by Daylight possibly offers a lot of fun with friends, based on the simple system of horror behind it.
The mix of dark animation and scary sounds are pretty fun, when you share the experience with friends.
Considering that DLC makes up 50% of the killers, for example and considering all the problem the game comes along with, the price of 20€ seems too high for me. Sometimes the game comes along in early access quality, because basic things like joining games do not work. Ping is horribly bad very often.
You will often feel an imbalance, especially when there is a new killer, that you have to buy for real money (if you want to play it, obviously...), by the way.
If you get this for a discounted price and you can share it with friends - play it.
Otherwise, don't. It will frustrate you.

P.S. Despite the size of the update, it will take a long time to install and use update from Dead by Daylight. Even though you have an update of a size like 70MB, which is downloaded instantly, it takes like 20 minutes to install it and run the game. This may be caused by Steam or Dead by Daylight, though, but is frustrating in either way.
Muy bueno!
good game.

Тебя приглашают на вписку, говорят, что будешь ты и еще четыре тян, но чтобы их оприходовать надо сначала поймать и связать
@
Находишь тян, она вместо того чтобы прятаться от тебя, тычет в тебя пальцем, зачем-то приседает несколько раз и светит тебе в рожу фонариком
@
Долго гоняешься за этой тян вокруг ящиков с паллетами, получаешь пару раз по голове досками
@
Наконец, ловишь ее, взваливаешь на плечо, тащишь на кровать
@
Откуда ни возьмись, появляются ее подружки и приседают у тебя под ногами, мешая пройти к кровати, светят в рожу фонариками, отгоняешь их
@
Дотаскиваешь пойманную тян до кровати, привязываешь ее чтобы не сбежала
@
Достаешь аппарат, собираешься вдуть, но другие тян бегают вокруг тебя и приседают, тычут пальцем
@
Тебя это выбешивает, бросаешь все, гонишься за другой тян
@
Она добегает до открытой входной двери приседает пару раз и сбегает
@
Пока бегал за той, привязнную отвязали подружки и сбежали через балкон
@
Каждая из сбежавших тян тебе звонит и говорит какое ты чмо, все не так делаешь, советуют больше никогда не ходить на вписки, хвастаются тесным знакомством с твоей мамкой

Kezdetben jó játéknak indult! Aztán ez megváltozott. Rengeteg camper gyilkos lett ami miatt elveszíti a játék az élményét. Ja, és a úgymond WH-s perkekről ne is beszéljünk. Hogy szinte a pálya végéből lát a killer. 10 meccsből legalább 6-7 csak szopás. Teljesen kiegyenlítettlen a játék a túlélőkkel szemben. Tök jó hogy látom a gyilkost... ja csak akkor ha nyitva van a kijárat.... Bravo! De a gyilkos felakaszt valakit akkor 4 másodpercik mindenkit lát. Ez fair? Nem is a gyilkos az ügyes hanem a játék helyette. Ezek a perkek rohadtúl nem kellenének a játékba. Pfff és arról még nem is beszéltem, hogy olyan perk is van ha megáll a gyilkos nem hallod a szívdobogását. Mit fog csinálni az ilyen??? Természetesen felakaszt valakit és lekemplei. Barátokkal nem 1x játszunk a játékkal és nagyon sokszor ezt csinálják. Főleg úgy hogy valakit levisz a pincébe a gyilkos és beáll a sarokba, természetesen azzal a perkkel amivel ha megáll nem halljuk Őt. Én úgy gondolom, hogy ilyen perkek nélkűl lenne igazán jó a játék. Meg ha lenne megoldás a camperekre.

Amo el juego, PERO tambien lo odio, pero es un odio que amo tener, es raro, me gusta el juego pero a la vez encuentro que muchos killers estan muy mal, el caso de enfermera y spiritu, en el cual muchas veces es mejor matarse en el gancho que jugar contra esos killer. Aun asi, pese a sus hits falsos, sus killers medios rotos, el maldito juego me encanta.

Ultimo parche es una real mierda, killers sobrefubeados y loops inutiles, habilidades nerfeadas sin sustitucion, prefiero jugar de killer hago mucho ams puntos y la paso mejor.

Обновляю обзор чисто из-за премии 2к19. ДоБоДе - параша и помойка с токсичным комьюнити, манами которые считаю что если кемпинг и тунелинг не запрещен разрабами, то они могу портить игру своим соперникам бикоз "ЫыЫыЫ енттьа токтека а ви педарасы и перебафанны!11!!1", что сюрвы готовы разорвать свою жопу от напора редкостного кала просто от того, что ты не так пошёл, не так не развёлся  и не того мана взял.
А вообще с добавлением архивов, выделенными серверами и (наконец) нёрфом нюрсы игра стала в разы лучше и приятнее, да и описанные выше люди стали в разы реже попадаться, но отзыв отрицательный из-за убитой нахуй нервной системы и порванного очка (зашить не удалось)

Dead by Daylight, isminden de tahmin edebileceğimiz üzere korku ögelerinin yoğunlukta olduğu bir hayatta kalma oyunu. Gecenin hüküm sürdüğü kasvetli bir ormanda, kana susamış bir katil ve hayatta kalmaya çalışan dört genç… Tam bir kedi – fare oyunu. Tabii roller her an değişebilir. Avcı, her an av konumuna düşebilir.Oyunun hikayesinden bahsedecek olursak; yeterli büyüklükte, kaçış yolları kapalı bir haritada bulunan dört genç ve onları öldürmek için peşlerine düşen bir katil, Dead by Daylight‘ın ana hikayesini oluşturuyorlar. Gençlerin kaçmak için bir tek şansları var. O da, haritanın belli bölgelerine konumlandırılmış olan jeneratörleri aktif hale getirmek. Katilin görevi ise oldukça basit, yakaladığı kurbanlarını kancaya asarak öldürmek!Oyunda, 4v1 olarak görünen sistem size adaletsizmiş gibi görünebilir veya aklınızda ”dört kişiler nasıl olsa, katili kolaylıkla yenebilirler” gibisinden düşünceler oluşabilir. Ancak durum hiç de öyle değil. Oyundaki denge çok güzel bir sisteme oturtulmuş. Her iki tarafın da birbirlerine karşı üstün gelebileceği noktalar var. Örneğin, gençler kaçarken çevrelerinde bulunan eşyaları devirebilir ve böylece katilin hızını kesmeye çalışabilirler. Yalnız, çevrenizde hiçbir şey yoksa ve düz bir arazide koşuyorsanız, bu noktada katilin hızı sizinkinde daha fazla olduğu için, yakalanma olasılığınız oldukça yüksek.

Dead by Daylight‘daki katillerin birbirlerinden farklı uzmanlık alanları mevcut. Örneğin, Trapper etrafa ayı tuzakları yerleştirebiliyor, Wraith görünmez olabiliyor ve Hillbilly ise son derece işlevsel şekilde elektrikli testere kullanabiliyor. Oyunun en güzel yanlarından biri de, oyunda geliştirebilir yetenek ağaçlarının bulunması. Yeteneklerinizi geliştirdikçe elinizde fener,ilk yardım çantası gibi ekipmanlarla oyuna girebiliyor ve bunlar sayesinde bir tık önde olabiliyorsunuz. Aynı durum katil için de geçerli, tuzaklarınızı geliştirip, baltanızı daha güçlü hale getirdikten sonra kurbanlarınızı elinizden kaçırmadan, daha kolay ve hızlı şekilde öldürebilirsiniz.Özetleyecek olursak; Dead by Daylight, adrenalin tutkunları ve korku temalı hayatta kalma oyunu fanatikleri için oldukça güzel bir alternatif oluşturuyor diyebiliriz. Oyunun, oynanış esnasında kişiler üzerinde yarattığı gerilim hissiyatı yapımın başarısını gösterir nitelikte. Oyunda çok oyuncu desteği de olduğundan, dilerseniz arkadaşlarınızla birlikte gerilim dolu güzel bir deneyim yaşayabilirsiniz. Dead by Daylight‘a Steam üzerinden 31 Tl ödeyerek sahip olabilirsiniz.

对于杀鸡这款游戏，写评测时候其实心情还是很复杂的。

一方面是我想给它个好评推荐，另一方面是我AFK已久似乎也没什么资格了。
游戏是很不错的，用心跳频率来表示危险距离，同时也增强了游戏代入感和氛围，这是个非常优秀的点子。不过可惜的是，盛于直播，衰于直播（虽然也有其他的因素，但主要还是被封杀了的问题，否则也不会热度下降的那么快）

现在还是有不少的人在玩，本来我也不是随波逐流的那批人，我自己而言挺喜欢这游戏的。
但是现在的确是没太多时间了，我的绝大多数在线游戏月均时长都在缩短，可惜我还是没能成为忠实玩家那一批人，抱歉。

不过我还是祝愿它能走得更远。
是个好游戏，但是对新人真的不是很友好~

Playing as a survivor is extremely fun especially when playing with friends.

There are always moments where I still get freaked out by the Killer even after hundred of hours of play.

第一次玩这个游戏的时候，没带耳机，因为我是残疾人，自已有助听器，但是刚开玩的时候，我的心脏似乎和游戏人物同为一体，激烈到我入神时没有发现，，可以说是十分惊险，作为新手不小心点开了反转Y柚，转换视觉特别困难，好在第一次终于成功逃出去，这才试验了许多次，才关上反转，降低了鼠标灵敏度，可能没有第一次好运气，老是被挂树，玩杀手没能成功挂人，要不是我脾气好，理智还在，我大概有可能会拔线，不过玩这个游戏就要负责到底，毕竟游戏体验较好，听声辩位对我来说特别困难，但是可以利用游戏人物心跳声来判断杀手距离，然而没什么卵用，因为我把把遇上都是老手，偶尔有好心的才放我一条生路，我在此特别想说，希望制作方多多注意这方面，哪位有大神带我去开黑，毕竟脸黑呀。
以及我在此希望开发商做出这样优秀的游戏时，越做越好，要是能打折就好了
重要的话说三遍，跪求大神加我好友，跪求大神加我好友，跪求大神加我好友，不要坑队友，不要素质差的

殺人鬼に追われるスリルがこのゲームの旨味なのだが、簡単に脱出できてしまう。ゲームの設計が、初心者サバイバーが熟練キラーにマッチしても勝てるようにとのことで設計されているため、チェイス開始5分で出口解放、4人全員無事生還といった結果が普通になっている。ヌルゲー。このゲームは得体のしれない殺人鬼になすすべもなく終われ逃げることに魅力があって流行ったと思うのだが、もはやスリルも恐怖もない。

残りの時間は主に殺人鬼を煽るのに使われるため、おちおち殺人鬼側も楽しめない。負けても不快にならなければ（とっとと出口から出って行ってくれれば）殺人鬼をやってもいいのだが、負ければ高確率で嫌な思いをする。

人によってはわざと発電機をすべてつけず、一つのこして永遠と殺人鬼に纏わりつき煽り倒して楽しむ人もいる。これをやられると殺人鬼はゲームを終了させることができないのでかなり困る。そういうプレイヤーは30分から一時間くらいは煽り続けるが、宅急便がきたり、お腹が痛くなったり、休日に上司から電話がきて仕事場に直行する人もいることを分かってほしい。

そしてこのゲームの現在のバランス上、やりこんでいるサバイバーが複数名いたらどうあがいても勝つのは難しいようにできている。開始5分以内で発電機が完了するため、その時間内に4人を三回ずつ吊らなければいけないのだが、どう見ても時間的に間に合わない。キャンプして確実に殺害すれば一人か二人はなんとかなるがキャンプすると自分のSNSに罵倒が飛んでくる。わぁ、こわい。

これは根本的にどうにかしてほしいのだが、チート多すぎ。プレイヤーがトランプの裏面に目印つける感覚で平気でチートをする。その状態で大会に参加したりする。ゲームの縦横比率を変えて見えない範囲まで見えるようにする手法も公式から許可が下りたことでみんな使ってる。クロスプレイが検討されているみたいだけど上記の理由からPS4などの層からも嫌われている。真面目にやってるこっちがバカらしくなる。

そして運営が定期的にプレイヤーをディスる。殺人鬼下手とか、うまい人のプレイを見ろとか、殺人鬼を使いこなせてないとかリリースノートに書いているようだが、公式がその動画を撮影して提供してほしい。
実況者とかやたらすすめてくるけど、実況者や芸人とかみんなが興味あるわけではないし、それに俺たちは実況者ほど暇じゃない。上手い実況者は5000時間超えはザラで実況者や学生だからできることで、普通に働いてたら一つのゲームに5000時間もかけられない。そういった実況者と一般のプレイヤーを比較して上手い人の動画を見ろと言っていることがもうおかしい。

バグが大量発生するのは仕方ないけど実績が解除されたりランクアップデートのエラーだったり深刻なものが増えた。

if分とelseでプログラミングは成り立つという発言をゲーム内のTIPSに入れてたけどプログラマーとしての常識を疑う。恥ずかしいと思わないのだろうか？

#RevertDBD I love this game and play killer and survivor, but the pay to win feel (killer) and highly unbalanced gameplay kills it. Although it is supposed to be an asymmetrical game, it feels more like the developers favor the killer side of the game. 

Nerfed/useless survivor perks + OP killer perks + lack of palates on the map + the default Unreal Engine character collision (hit boxes) + killers w/ precision weapons = a game that isn't asymmetrical as much as it is terribly broken and hard to actually enjoy unless you are playing killer. 

ALSO, maybe hire a Black animator or character artist  to actually give Claudette some decent hair cause right now you can tell the demographic of their studio ......

Here's a transcript of my Reddit post as the mods there have removed it:

I have some urgent pre-season consumer advice if you're of the general assumption that minding your own business and relying on common-sense is a reliable way of staying out of trouble: It doesn't seem to apply in this game.

For example, while at first I thought my permanent ban would be promptly reversed as a random mistake, Behaviour's customer support have failed to act on any of my requests to provide information over the past six weeks and at this point I'm convinced they simply don't know what's happening, possibly opting for the silent treatment in the hope I'll either evaporate or buy another copy, as mentioned in the topic.

Only one of my emails was answered in which they state they are looking into my case, but my patience and four (plus one tweet) subsequent emails (both to DBD and to Behaviour's chief email addresses) have all been conspicuously ignored. Another player claimed to have a similar issue and contacted support after I did, and received a response before I have. This leads me to believe Behaviour's game is too unruly to provide the kind of consistent experience many consumers are hoping for and with this in mind I urge potential buyers that there is a chance you will be removed from the game without warning or explanation by people who are presumably careless, overworked, or both.

While this policy is in effect I cordially invite Behaviour to prove they are not attempting to extort victims who are banned for coincidental assumptions which can't actually be evidenced in the hope people simply buy their way back into the game rather than protest, as I am. The easiest way Behaviour can do this is by investigating who is responsible for issuing these bans and recognizing they may need additional training in pairing evidence with supposition.

I've also created a Steam feedback topic which discusses the effects of banning people and in it I highlight the importance of staff to strictly follow conclusive evidence to protect the integrity of their product, though it mostly deals with the information surrounding my case particularly. Go here if you're interested in doing Behaviour's job for them:

https://steamcommunity.com/app/381210/discussions/5/3183345176711493001/

Lastly, at some point in the near future I will look into opening the necessary channels to Steam to voice my protest to someone in sales as I fear they would be interested in protecting the safety and integrity of their customers and Behaviour's actions may be indirectly damaging their brand. If Behaviour are responsible for my situation but are unable to explain it, that is an interesting situation.

This is probably my final attempt to gain some kind of closure on this matter and I urge the company to recognize there is a chance my case may be more common than is realized, but that those particular victims lack the skills to voice their protest effectively. The consequences of this, as I mentioned, hurt sales indirectly as dissatisfied customers detract from the product's potential, as I am doing here. Like my candid Steam review, I would be available to remove or modify these unflattering commentaries if Behaviour are willing to convince me they are serious about treating their customers fairly.

As a general supporter of underdog indie companies I wish Behaviour all the best in their future endeavors and again hope issues like mine are unusual. May I also add on a personal note that as a part-time game admin, our staff have a very strict banning procedure and it's embarrassing how at least one individual is allowed to inflict this degree of ineptitude on others, and although I worry how much harm this is causing, I am secretly grateful to their dedication in providing a flattering contrast to their more professional counterparts in other games.

Apologies for the unflattering tone and thanks for your time.

Edit 1: Depressing replies as expected, but this is a cautionary tale, not an appeal. I at least hope the person who banned me knows who they are, and aside from this incident, I hope their colleagues are proud of their work.

Edit 2: Correspondence for the curious: https://imgur.com/a/cMYNZ

Edit 3: I should probably invite anyone who knows something similar to have happened to share their experience. For those who aren't lottery-banned, enjoy the game. I've tried to warn as many people as I care to.

In my profile you can negatively track when Behaviour bother to give me an explanation.

[b]Do not buy this game, folks. [u]I implore Steam to investigate.[/u]
With these clowns giving this game away on Epic, they just opened the floodgates to even more issues than before. They should be paying me to even think about this garbage.
I personally love the game, but there's a lot that needs fixing.

Concept de base interessant. Le jeu se prend en main assez rapidement au bout de quelques parties d'apprentissage...

C'est à peu près tout pour les points "positifs"...

En effet, après plusieurs heures de jeu, le constat est affligeant: des serveurs qui plantent une fois sur deux (quand ce n'est pas le jeu lui même qui se met en PLS), un matchmaking pensé avec les pieds (dans quel univers peut on qualifier le fait de mettre des novices face à des joueurs experimentés comme étant quelque chose de normal et de censé?!!) Et un équilibrage entre tueurs et survivants completement aux fraises malgré les plaintes des joueurs que l'on trouve un peu partout sur le net...

Voila la recette d'un jeu qui ne mérite même pas la moitié du prix demandé sur Steam... Et quand on ajoute à cela des DLC qui ne sont ni plus ni moins que du "pay to win"... Que dire à part passez votre chemin, ce jeu est une amère déception qui vous fera, promotion steam ou pas, mal au porte monnaie.
Although the reviews for this game are pretty negative, and i can see why as Killers are campers sometimes, when there is a good killer, it is insanely fun and playing with friends is even more fun.

Ce jeu a un excellent concept malheureusement il est très mal exécuté. Les serveurs beuguent la plupart du temps, 
les tueurs sont beaucoup plus fort que les survivants notamment freddy qui est beaucoup plus fort que les autres tueurs et quasiment incontrable (il devient invisible et personne ne peut le voir...) Et, une fois qu'il vous court aprés, vous n'avez pas la moindre chance! Je suis très déçue de ce jeu qui pour moi ne vaut absolument pas son prix! attendez les offres steam si vous souhaitez vous l'offrir. Au delà, c'est une arnaque!

С тех пор как эту турбазу открыли совсем спокойной жизни нет!
Давеча вот, четверо таких сломились ко мне во двор, пьяные, бегают, шумят, в капканы мои лезут! Для них это как игра, черт возьми! А я тут между прочим охочусь! Живу я тут! Мне некогда бегать за ними и просить вежливо уйти, я хочу посмотреть фильм и попить чайку. Нет же, приходится ловить бухих туристов, и вешать на крючки, что бы протрезвили и в капканы не угодили. Так ещё что удумали, генераторы мои старые на цвет мет, видимо, разбирать. Да им же 30 с лишним лет! Как дед помер, так к ним никто и не подходил, это же опасно! Я как-то залез в один такой, теперь не рожа – а месиво. Проще новый купить. Так эти, черт бы их побрал, лезут, их прогонишь – опять бегут. Даже не слушают, носятся, орут, а туалете прячутся, прямо перед носом деревянные щиты кидают, все ноги отдавили. Приходится рукоприкладствовать… Ну, а что сделаешь? По-другому же не понимают. Ндаа… Опять, кажется, вандалы, залезли. Слышу кто-то в сундуке роется, пойду посмотрю…
